Detailed Description
This is an abstract pipeline data producer class.
The production component class of the generator mode. The derived class of this class is responsible for creating complex pipeline data objects step by step.

BuilderNavigationToolCollector() BuilderNavigationToolCollectorPipelineBuilder PipelineBuilderBuilderNavigationToolCollector
void PipelineBuilder::BuilderNavigationToolCollector (int index, unsigned int number, long interval = 20 , double accuracyRange = 0.5 )[virtual]
Produce a navigation data acquisition filter.
Warning
The subscript value determines the processing order of the data pipeline, with 0 as the starting point. followed by 1, 2....
If the subscript value already has a data processing filter, the current request will overwrite the target.
Parameters
index
Filter subscript value, mapping table of pipeline data manager
number
Number property of the navigation data collection filter
interval
Collection interval time of navigation data collection filter
accuracyRange
Acceptable precision range of navigation data acquisition filter
See also
NavigationToolCollector

BuilderNavigationToolToNavigationToolFilter() BuilderNavigationToolToNavigationToolFilterPipelineBuilder PipelineBuilderBuilderNavigationToolToNavigationToolFilter
void PipelineBuilder::BuilderNavigationToolToNavigationToolFilter (int index, mitk::NavigationData * ucsTool)[virtual]
Produce a tool to tool pipeline data conversion filter.
Produce a tool to tool pipeline data conversion filter, and configure it to the subscript value memory corresponding to the pipeline data manager.
If the subscript value already has a data processing filter, the current request will overwrite the target.
Warning
The subscript value determines the processing order of the data pipeline, with 0 as the starting point. followed by 1, 2....
Parameters
index
Filter subscript value, mapping table of pipeline data manager
ucsTool
Target tool navigation data. Entering the tool navigation data will go to the tool coordinate system.
See also
NavigationToolToNavigationToolFilter

void PipelineBuilder::BuilderNavigationToolToSpaceFilter (int index, vtkMatrix4x4 * convert)[virtual]
Produce a space to space conversion filter.
Produce a space to space conversion filter, and configure it to the subsc- ript value memory corresponding to the pipeline data manager.
If the subscript value already has a data processing filter, the current request will overwrite the target.
Warning
The subscript value determines the processing order of the data pipeline, with 0 as the starting point. followed by 1, 2....
Parameters
index
Filter subscript value, mapping table of pipeline data manager
convert
Target tool navigation data. Entering the tool navigation data will be transferred to this spatial coordinate system.
See also
NavigationToolToSpaceFilter
